ZMap Changes/Fixes [from cvs]

  • Browse CVS
  • doc/Release_notes/release_notes.2008_05_06.shtml: new zmap release notes for 6 May 2008
  • doc/Release_notes/LAST_RELEASE_DATE.txt: update last release notes to 01/05/2008
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapUtils.c: calculate length of version string
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapLogging.c: include version in stack trace.
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapGUIutils.c: trivial cover function to create toplevel windows with a "ZMap" title
  • src/zmapUtils/: zmapCmdLineArgs.c, zmapCmdLineArgs_P.h: remove popt dependency
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowContainer.h: simplier redraw/recurse function
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowDraw.c: simplier redraw/recurse function fix for rt ticket #66077
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowItemText.c: use simplier redraw/recurse function
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapCmdLineArgs.c: Make sure strings are similar using quarks...
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapCmdLineArgs.c: more information in the --help option
  • src/zmapUtils/: zmapCmdLineArgs.c, zmapCmdLineArgs_P.h: fix the behaviour I had missed reimplementing when switching to g_option
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindow.c: unlock a pair of windows correctly
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowDraw.c: Never shrink the width of h-split windows. Actually... set the scroll region to be equal for h-split windows
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindowDrawFeatures.c, zmapWindowState.c: Fix RT Ticket 66294 (ZMap Reposition on saving)
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowState.h: Fix RT Ticket 66294 (ZMap Reposition on saving)
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindowMark.c, zmapWindowItem.c: Fix RT Ticket 55131 (Problems with marking when reverse complementing)
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindowState.c, zmapWindow.c: Fix RT Ticket # 66253 (When revcomp all bumping is lost)
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindow.c: Fix RT Ticket # 61379 (Dragging to extend marked area)
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowMark.c: quick check of coords
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapUtils_P.h: /var/tmp/zmap.29519/ZMap/scripts/versioner run by zmap

Aceb Changes/Fixes [from cvs]

  • Browse CVS
  • wh/smap.h: change strand enum to be standard forward/reverse, add align struct which holds ref and match sequence strand.
  • w6/smap_.h: change strand enums, add/correct documentation of smapkeyinfo struct.
  • w7/smapconvert.c: make convertHomol record ref & match sequence strands in segs using new smap call.
  • w6/smap.c: Make funcs like smapcomposemaps return a status. Add cigar line support, more to do here. Add support for new align struct. Improve smapdump output.
  • w6/smap.c: def out debugging output but leave in code until cigar work finished.
  • w7/smapconvert.c: fix really poor bug of mine giving wrong parent to homol segs...
  • w6/display.c, wh/display.h: provide mechanism to automatically remove graphs e.g. keyset window, which result from tab displayblock interactions.
  • whelp/Tree.html: add description of short cuts...
  • w9/: gmapdata.c, gmapdatacol.c, gmapphys.c: moving these to be with other gmap files, no idea why they weren't.
  • w7/: gmapdata.c, gmapdatacol.c, gmapphys.c: moved from w9, don't know why they were there but seems not logical.
  • w2/colcontrol.c: moved to w7 where it is more relevant.
  • w7/colcontrol.c: moved from w2, shouldn't be there, it is a level above.
  • w7/: gmapdata.c, gmapdatacol.c, gmapphys.c: moved here from w9
  • wmake/truemake: fix up gmap dependencies.
  • w7/gmap_.h: add new gmap private header.
